function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Possible influx of COVID-19 patients in temporary hospitals","Impact":"Overwhelmed healthcare system, increased spread of the virus","Mitigation":"Implement efficient triage and treatment areas, prepare for surge capacity","Technologies":"Triage management software, telemedicine, patient flow optimization tools","People":"Healthcare workers, patients, community","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, government health departments"},{"Description":"Potential infection risks within the built environment","Impact":"Increased transmission of contagious diseases, higher infection rates","Mitigation":"Use hygienic and antibacterial materials, prioritize sanitation and cleaning strategies","Technologies":"Antibacterial building materials, nano-coatings, UV-C disinfection systems","People":"Building occupants, visitors, healthcare workers","Owner":"Architects, designers, building management"},{"Description":"Risks associated with nanomaterials and nanotechnology","Impact":"Potential health risks from exposure to nanomaterials","Mitigation":"Conduct thorough risk assessments, implement strict safety measures for nanotechnology","Technologies":"Nanomaterial risk assessment tools, personal protective equipment for handling nanomaterials","People":"Research scientists, manufacturing workers, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Research institutions, manufacturing facilities, healthcare organizations"}]}
